newsitem.title: UK: BAT falls on report of failed split-up plan.
newsitem.headline: BAT falls on report of failed split-up plan.

text.p: Shares in B.A.T Industries Plc fell 10-1/2 pence to 462 following a newspaper report that a secret plan had collapsed to split the tobacco and financial services group, market makers said.
The Guardian newspaper said the abortive plan would have involved the merger of B.A.T's financial business with one of Britain's other leading insurance groups.
"The shares are down on the Guardian article," a market maker said.
B.A.T's demerger plan seemed to have run into trouble for unknown reasons early last week, the Guardian said.
